name: stackoverflow_scrape_trending
description: Scrape trending/hot questions from Stack Overflow. Returns the most active and popular questions currently trending on the platform.

steps.code: const questions = []; const qEls = document.querySelectorAll('.s-post-summary, .question-summary, [id*="question-summary"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(qEls.length, 20); i++) { const el = qEls[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h3 a, .s-post-summary--content-title a, .result-link a'); const votesEl = el.querySelector('.s-post-summary--stats-item__emphasized .s-post-summary--stats-item-number, .vote-count-post strong'); const answersEl = el.querySelector('.s-post-summary--stats-item:nth-child(2) .s-post-summary--stats-item-number, .status strong'); const viewsEl = el.querySelector('.s-post-summary--stats-item:nth-child(3) .s-post-summary--stats-item-number'); const tagEls = el.querySelectorAll('.s-tag, .post-tag'); const tags = []; tagEls.forEach(function(t) { tags.push(t.textContent.trim()); }); const authorEl = el.querySelector('.s-user-card--link a, .user-details a'); const dateEl = el.querySelector('.relativetime, time'); const excerptEl = el.querySelector('.s-post-summary--content-excerpt, .excerpt'); questions.push({ rank: i + 1, title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', votes: votesEl ? votesEl.textContent.trim() : '0', answers: answersEl ? answersEl.textContent.trim() : '0', views: viewsEl ? viewsEl.textContent.trim() : '', tags: tags.slice(0, 5), author: authorEl ? authorEl.textContent.trim() : '', date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('title') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', excerpt: excerptEl ? excerptEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 200) : '', url: titleEl ? 'https://stackoverflow.com' + titleEl.getAttribute('href') : '' }); } return { trending_count: questions.length, questions: questions, url: window.location.href }
